General.Name: Sportsoul Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Sportsoul Co.,Ltd. engages in research, development, design, production, and sale of leisure sports and fitness equipment in China. Its products portfolio include trampoline, treadmill, elliptical machine, exercise bike, comprehensive training machine, and barbell rack. The company offers its products under the Skywalker and Techplus brands through e-commerce channels and retailers. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Canada, the United Kingdom, and other regions. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Qingdao, China.
